name: Muzzio, Visionary Architect
originalText: {3}{U}, {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the highest converted mana cost among artifacts you control. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: The value of X is determined as the ability resolves. If, at that time, you control no artifacts, you won't look at any cards.

text: {3}{U}, {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the highest mana value among artifacts you control. You may put an artifact card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
